Function reference

Environments

Environments that contain information.

config
Flags/values to be used in the 'dashboards' scene
connections
Environment to store db connections

Data and databases

These functions relate to data and databases.

tbl

Censoring

censor_function_factory_everything()
censor 0-4 function factory If you use granularity_geo\* and granularity_time\* together, then they will be treated as AND
censor_function_factory_nothing()
censor 0-4 function factory If you use granularity_geo\* and granularity_time\* together, then they will be treated as AND
censor_function_factory_values_0_4()
censor 0-4 function factory
censor_list_function_factory()
censor 0-4 function factory

Validators

validator_field_contents_blank()
Blank data validator
validator_field_contents_sykdomspulsen()
validator_field_contents_sykdomspulsen An example (schema) validator of database data used in Sykdomspulsen
validator_field_types_blank()
Blank field_types validator
validator_field_types_sykdomspulsen()
validator_field_types_sykdomspulsen An example (schema) validator of field_types used in Sykdomspulsen

These are utility functions for databases. You probably won’t work with them.

Tasks

A task is the basic operational unit of Sykdomspulsen Core.

R6 classes and their helper functions.

Functions

These functions access datasets.

tm_get_argset()
Shortcut to argset within plan within task

Shortcut to data within plan within task

Shortcut to plan within task
tm_get_plans()
Shortcut to plan within task

Gets a data.table overview of index_plan and index_analysis

Shortcut to schema within task
tm_get_task()
Shortcut to task

shortcut to get available task names

Shortcut to run task

Shortcut to argset within plan within task

Shortcut to data within plan within task

Utility functions.

Simple functions used for testing.

sc_test_action (action)
